name: LITTLE CANDLE
description: This artwork was made in 2020, with watercolor on a3 paper. In this life there must be something positive and something negative. When in the darkness a small light is very meaningful. The concept of this artwork is describe a woman holding a small candle in the darkness. The spirit in this painting to explain we can be like that little candle, giving our light to illuminate around us. In our life, it gives meaning how we share positive things with others even if it's just a little light.
